text:
Blockai | Sr. Backend Engineer | San Francisco | FULL TIME, ONSITE, https://blockai.com

We're hiring our first backend engineer to work on a greenfield, large-scale, image search engine. Our ideal candidate has experience with database systems, computer vision and is proficient with at least one of Python, Java, C, C++, Go. You must have a solid CS/SE background and be reasonably comfortable reading academic papers.

If you're up for the challenge, send me an email (oli@binded.com) and mention HN.
